miso.name: White Miso
miso.description: A light and sweet miso made from rice koji and soybeans. Fermented for a shorter period, resulting in a mild, delicate flavor.

miso.name: Red Miso
miso.description: A rich and robust miso with deep umami flavors. Fermented longer than white miso, creating a complex and hearty taste.

miso.name: Mixed Miso
miso.description: Our special blend of different miso types, creating a unique balance of flavors that's perfect for our signature ramen.
